alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Dooly; Sumter (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 7:48AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Dooly, southeastern Sumter and northwestern Crisp Counties through 815 AM EST... At 748 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Smithville, or 11 miles south of Americus, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Leslie, De Soto, Desoto, Cobb, Sumter, Lamar, Drayton, Georgia Veterans Memorial St Pk, Flint River Wma and Huntington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
